subcommands.name: spaces:peering:info
subcommands.desc: display the information necessary to initiate a peering connection

subcommands.name: spaces:peerings
subcommands.desc: list peering connections for a space

subcommands.name: spaces:peerings:accept
subcommands.desc: accepts a pending peering request for a private space

subcommands.name: spaces:peerings:destroy
subcommands.desc: destroys an active peering connection in a private space

subcommands.name: spaces:vpn:config
subcommands.desc: display the configuration information for VPN

subcommands.name: spaces:vpn:destroy
subcommands.desc: destroys VPN in a private space

subcommands.name: spaces:vpn:wait
subcommands.desc: wait for VPN to be created

subcommands.name: spaces:wait
subcommands.desc: wait for a space to be created
